entry.title: Example Draft
entry.content:
This is a post that has some content in it. Why is it full of content? I don’t freaking know.

Why there’s content.

I told you I don’t know, why do you ask me all the time?

This is not a paragraph.

Right.

oprah.gif?zoom=2&resize=300%2C169&ssl=1

How can I raise my hand?

  1. Have a body
  2. Check yoself
  3. Also check that you have an arm with a hand on the end of it by pointing your head down and moving your eyeballs to where your hand should be if you had one.
  4. Oh good, you have one. Huzzah.
  5. Raise the fucking hand.

Anything else you need to say for yourself?

nope. go home.

I went home. —you
entry.summary: This is a post that has some content in it. Why is it full of content? I don’t freaking know.

entry.title: Welcome to the Forestry Demo Site!

link.title: Welcome to the Forestry Demo Site!

entry.content:
Welcome to the Belkirk College of Engineering Demo Site!

This site allows you to explore Forestry’s features and functionality, and is not meant to be used as a production website. To get started building your own site, please see our documentation.

Thank you for choosing to demo Forestry!
entry.summary: Welcome to the Belkirk College of Engineering Demo Site!
